name: MKMarkerAnnotationView
desc: An annotation view that displays a balloon-shaped marker at the designated location.

items.name: var markerTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The background color of the marker balloon.

items.name: var glyphText: String?
items.desc: The text to display in the marker balloon.

items.name: var glyphImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image to display in the marker balloon.

items.name: var glyphTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color to apply to the glyph text or image.

items.name: var selectedGlyphImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image to display when the user selects the marker.

items.name: var titleVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility
items.desc: The visibility of the title text rendered beneath the marker balloon.

items.name: var subtitleVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility
items.desc: The visibility of the subtitle text rendered beneath the marker balloon.

items.name: enum MKFeatureVisibility
items.desc: Constants that indicate the visibility of different map features.

items.name: var animatesWhenAdded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the marker animates into position onscreen.
